note:
Formerly a civil engineer, once one, always one, then on retirement, a film maker. Long time interest in photography going back to childhood and have a lot of scanned photos going vaccinated to 18th century from family albums etc. Longtime interest in cinematography dating back to late 1950s including 8mm, VHS, SD, HD and UHD. Film only in UHD these days.
Can restore photos and film but only for self, including use of Artificial Intelligence, like magic!
